price: Da možda oni nemaju kakav udio u vlasti?! A da imaju, oni ljudima ništa – ni koliko udubljenje na hurminoj košpici – ne bi dali.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am lahum naṣībun mina al-mul'ki fa-idhan lā yu'tūna al-nāsa naqīran
translations: (even as much as the) speck on a date seed
